thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 6 of 599
thread.title: Holly

author: Holly
title: Holly
text: It was over all a good experience only thing that was a little irritating was that when they start telling u price for storage they dont tell u right way about the insurance u have to purchase they get to that a little later in the conversation. So ur not really getting a good deal with them when they say only $1for first month because of the extra fees. But other than that it was awesome sauce..
